actions.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks and one Chatkcha attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Gythka

actions.description: 7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Chatkcha
